item.title: Awards and recognition
item.description:
2020

  1. Marie Skłodowska-Curie COFUND Fellowship under the project ``Quantitative genetics and genomics of plant breeding’’
  2. Runner-up Poster on Young-ISA Twitter Poster Conference promoted by the Irish Statistical Association. Poster Title: Global short-term forecasting of Covid-19 cases. Authors: Oliveira, T.P.; Moral, R.A., July, 2020

2010

  1. Honorable Mention at the 18th USP International Symposium of Undergraduate Research, University of São Paulo.

item.title: Finalized Projects
item.description:
2020

The lcc Package

Summary: Estimating longitudinal concordance correlation function

Publications:

  1. lcc: Longitudinal Concordance Correlation (2018)
  2. Longitudinal Concordance Correlation Function Based on Variance Components: An Application in Fruit Color Analysis (2018)

2019

Measuring color using image analysis

Summary: Promote the usage of image analysis as well as development of statistical methodologies for that purpose.

Publications:

  1. Longitudinal concordance correlation function based on variance components: an application in fruit color analysis
  2. Measuring color hue in ‘Sunrise Solo’ papaya using a flatbed scanner
